definition:
### Plane {#plane .unnumbered}

1.  Cartesian coordinates

2.  Polar coordinates

### ${\mathbbmss{R}}^3$ {#mathbbmssr3 .unnumbered}

1.  2.  Spherical coordinates

3.  Cylindrical coordinates

### Sphere $S^2$ {#sphere-s2 .unnumbered}

1.  Stereographic projection

2.  Mercator projection

3.  ..

### Miscellaneous {#miscellaneous .unnumbered}

1.  Barycentric coordinates

2.  Homogeneous coordinates $(x,\,y,\,t)$ in plane, $(x,\,y,\,z,\,t)$ in
    ${\mathbbmss{R}}^3$

### Differential geometry {#differential-geometry .unnumbered}

1.  in Riemann geometry

2.  in symplectic geometry

3.  Gaussian coordinates

4.  Fermi coordinates for a submanifold

5.  Boundary coordinates

### Coordinate transformations {#coordinate-transformations .unnumbered}

1.  2.  in algebraic topology (homotopy theory)

3.  Lorentz group transformations

4.  Cartesian-to-polar coordinate transformations

5.  Cartesian-to-spherical coordinate transformations

6.  A.

7.  B.
